ygData.subject: Re: Gay Guild on The Nameless
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry we missed you when you visited us on The Nameless.  There are quite a few of us there so it s a pity we failed to hook up. The guild has not folded.  Oh
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry we missed you when you visited us on The Nameless. There are
quite a few of us there so it's a pity we failed to hook up.

The guild has not folded. Oh no! In fact, it has not officially
made it out of the starting gate yet. We're still trying to get 10
people on at the same time in the same zone (it's like herding
cats!) - we came very close last week but this week we will succeed!

On Monday June 18th between 6 and 7pm Pacific Time we will be in
Butcherblock outside Kaladim where WOLFVEN, our Fearless Guild
Leader, will invite us into the guild and do all the official guild
set-up stuff with an EQ GM. Anyone who wants to help out could just
create a dwarf character on The Nameless that evening and come to the
gates at Kaladim. That will ensure that we get the right number of
people to get going. We will be most appreciative and you'll have
helped create a new gay guild. Yay!

Our guild will be based on welcoming gay people to a safe, friendly,
and fun place to play EverQuest.

All of us have characters on other servers and we're all conflicted
about leaving behind high levels characters, plat and goodies but
from our experiences grouping together so far on The Nameless I'd
have to say it has been totally worthwhile.

Hope to see all of y'all this Monday.

If you're on The Nameless send a tell to just say hi to me at:

Dandee Lyon (wood elf druid)
Darshe Blows (half elf rogue)
Poppie Power (gnome wizzie)

Best to all,

Dandee, Darshe, and Poppie


--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Rob Ruger" <aethercub@b...> wrote:
> What happened to Nameless Love? I created a character on Nameless
so that I
> could talk to you guys, but there was never anyone on...did the
guild fold
> or what? :-(
>
> Rob
> Ghuz Spineshank
> 31 warrior of the Mystic Alliance
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Alistair" <gameeverquest@a...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, June 09, 2001 5:10 PM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Gay Guild on The Nameless
>
>
> > Stonewall Pride
> >
> > Hi folks:
> >
> > A gay guild is forming on The Nameless server at this time and we
> > invite anyone interested to join us and be part of "Stonewall
Pride."
> >
> > "Stonewall Pride" is the tentative name of the new guild (yet to
be
> > approved by Verant). We hope to create a guild based on a
welcoming
> > gay / lesbian / bi / trans fellowship where any of us can play EQ
> > without being subject to the anti-gay prejudice that we frequently
> > encounter in Norrath.
> >
> > We're still formulating the charter and operating mode so you can
> > definitely provide input regarding your ideas about a gay guild or
> > your experiences in a gay guild such as the renown Mystic
Adventurers
> > on Rodcet Nife.
> >
> > We're currently using a Yahoo Club for contact -
> > http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/gayandlesbianeverquestfolk. We're
> > having a meeting in the chat room of that club on Monday June
11th at
> > 8pm Central time (6pm PST) to discuss "Stonewall Pride" and how to
> > get it running smoothly.
> >
> > Many of us have moved from other servers to The Nameless so we
mostly
> > have lowbie characters at this point - not aware of any over 20
yet -
> > so start up a character on The Nameless and join us!
> >
> > Best wishes to all,
> >
> > Poppie Power (gnome wizard)
> > Dandee Lyon (wood elf druid)
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> >
> >
> >
